content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to read the file "language_resources.txt" and your computer returned a list of language learning resources. Additionally, you gave me a command to browse the website "https://www.atlasobscura.com/" and find unique destinations and interesting stories associated with them. However, the command to get hyperlinks from the website failed due to too much output. Do not execute this command again with the same arguments. You also gave me a command to Google "information about love". The Google command returned several links related to love and information. You also gave me a command to list files in the directory "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/", but it returned too much output. Do not execute this command again with the same arguments. Finally, you gave me a command to Google "language learning resources" which returned a list of websites with language learning resources.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alllanguageresources.com/", "question": "language learning resources"}}}'}]
"""
